meanings.sent3: The scandalousness of the gossip made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The scandalousness of the rumor spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The scandalousness of the dress caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The scandalousness of his behavior was unacceptable.
